about_the_game:
Sound track to the game - Mike was Cursed.
In a complete set you are waited by 8 tracks (mp3) used in a game:
1. MWC_Atmos.mp3
2. MWC_Credits.mp3
3. MWC_Fire.mp3
4. MWC_HearYou.mp3
5. MWC_Monster.mp3
6. MWC_NeedHelp.mp3
7. MWC_Remember.mp3
8. MWC_WrongWay.mp3
After setting of complete set music will be on the way: Steam\steamapps\common[game _ folder]\soundtrack
